text: "I'M ECSTATIC, THIS IS LIKE MY BIRTHDAY!" Connie Ramsey and her daughter, Jodi, are homebound and can't leave to get a #covid19 vaccine. Today, they were the first in Berks County to receive an at-home vaccine through the County's newest #vaccine effort. Details @ 5:30 on @69News https://t.co/95xAuiDPEx
